actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution condemning the Soviet Union's failure to observe existing international conventions to which it is a party, especially the newest restriction respecting the delivery of parcels from the United States.

summary.text: Condemns the Soviet Union's failure to observe existing international conventions to which it is a party, especially the restriction respecting the delivery of parcels.

titles.title: Resolution condemning the Soviet Union's failure to observe existing international conventions to which it is a party, especially the newest restriction respecting the delivery of parcels from the United States.
